description: Conferencing & Operator Assisted Service (COAS)February 9, 2023 Questions from SSCFollowing the 1-1 engagement sessions on the draft RFP, SSC is interested in understanding the various pricing and licensing models of your SaaS AWS platform and would encourage you to respond directly to Eric Vanasse by no later  than February 16, 2023, for the following request.What licensing models does your organization offer for the SaaS AWS product? Please complete the table below with the information requested.Do your pricing models allow for an adjustment both downward and upward of the number of licenses? If yes, on what frequency is the adjustment permitted?What is your roadmap of licensing models and pricing plans for the SaaS Service?If you have any questions or would like to submit your answers, please contact the Contracting Authority Eric Vanasse eric.vanasse@ssc-spc.gc.ca
